title: Harper Sacredstriker
content:
Spiritual Weapon

Main Hand OnlyTopple

This quarterstaff is as solid as the bond between each member of the Harpers - even working in anonymity, they do so with a common and righteous cause.

Quarterstaff Versatile

Harper Sacredstriker is one of the Quarterstaff Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Harper Sacredstriker is an enchanted quarterstaff that allows the user to cast Spiritual Weapon at a high level. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versat
